languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, офицер прав". {n}Абеляр взирает на Маражая нахмурившись.{/n} "Если так и дальше пойдет, экипаж взбунтуется. Резня на палубе в каждый варп-переход... не хватало нам обычных бед, которые в эти дни происходят, так если еще и бойня на палубе..." {n}Он качает головой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, офицер прав". {n}Абеляр взирает на Маражая нахмурившись.{/n} "Если так и дальше пойдет, экипаж взбунтуется. Резня на палубе в каждый варп-переход... не хватало нам обычных бед, которые в эти дни происходят, так если еще и бойня на палубе..." {n}Он качает головой.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, the officer has a point." {n}Abelard glowers at Marazhai.{/n} "If things continue on like this, we might end up with a mutiny on our hands. A massacre during every warp jump... As if we didn't have enough troubles to deal with on days like this." {n}He shakes his head.{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, l'officier a raison. {n}dit Abélard en toisant Marazhai d'un air menaçant.{/n} Si ça continue ainsi, nous risquons la mutinerie. Un massacre à chaque saut Warp... Notre situation est déjà assez périlleuse comme ça. » {n}Il secoue la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the officer has a point." {n}Abelard glowers at Marazhai.{/n} "If things continue on like this, we might end up with a mutiny on our hands. A massacre during every warp jump... As if we didn't have enough troubles to deal with on days like this." {n}He shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, l'officier a raison. {n}dit Abélard en toisant Marazhai d'un air menaçant.{/n} Si ça continue ainsi, nous risquons la mutinerie. Un massacre à chaque saut Warp... Notre situation est déjà assez périlleuse comme ça. » {n}Il secoue la tête.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、士官の言うことには一理あります」{n}アベラルドはマラズハイをにらみつける。{/n}「このままでは反乱が起きるかもしれません。ワープジャンプのたびに大虐殺が起きるなど…まるで我々が今抱えている問題だけでは足りないとでも言っているかのようです」{n}彼は頭を振った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the officer has a point." {n}Abelard glowers at Marazhai.{/n} "If things continue on like this, we might end up with a mutiny on our hands. A massacre during every warp jump... As if we didn't have enough troubles to deal with on days like this." {n}He shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、士官の言うことには一理あります」{n}アベラルドはマラズハイをにらみつける。{/n}「このままでは反乱が起きるかもしれません。ワープジャンプのたびに大虐殺が起きるなど…まるで我々が今抱えている問題だけでは足りないとでも言っているかのようです」{n}彼は頭を振った。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，这位军官的话很有道理。”{n}阿贝拉德怒视着玛拉斋。{/n}“如果事情总是这样下去，我们的船上可能会发生叛乱。如果每次亚空间跳跃都发生这样的屠杀……看起来就像我们嫌船上的麻烦还不够多一样。”{n}他摇了摇头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the officer has a point." {n}Abelard glowers at Marazhai.{/n} "If things continue on like this, we might end up with a mutiny on our hands. A massacre during every warp jump... As if we didn't have enough troubles to deal with on days like this." {n}He shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这位军官的话很有道理。”{n}阿贝拉德怒视着玛拉斋。{/n}“如果事情总是这样下去，我们的船上可能会发生叛乱。如果每次亚空间跳跃都发生这样的屠杀……看起来就像我们嫌船上的麻烦还不够多一样。”{n}他摇了摇头。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, der Offizier hat nicht unrecht." {n}Abelard blickt Marazhai grimmig an.{/n} "Wenn es so weitergeht, kommt es vielleicht noch zu einer Meuterei. Ein Massaker während jedes Warpsprungs ... Als hätten wir an solchen Tagen nicht schon genug Probleme zu bewältigen." {n}Er schüttelt den Kopf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the officer has a point." {n}Abelard glowers at Marazhai.{/n} "If things continue on like this, we might end up with a mutiny on our hands. A massacre during every warp jump... As if we didn't have enough troubles to deal with on days like this." {n}He shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, der Offizier hat nicht unrecht." {n}Abelard blickt Marazhai grimmig an.{/n} "Wenn es so weitergeht, kommt es vielleicht noch zu einer Meuterei. Ein Massaker während jedes Warpsprungs ... Als hätten wir an solchen Tagen nicht schon genug Probleme zu bewältigen." {n}Er schüttelt den Kopf.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, el guardia tiene razón». {n}Abelard mira con el ceño fruncido a Marazhai.{/n} «Si esto sigue así, la tripulación terminará por amotinarse. Una masacre en cada salto de disformidad... Como si no tuviésemos bastantes problemas últimamente». {n}El senescal menea la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the officer has a point." {n}Abelard glowers at Marazhai.{/n} "If things continue on like this, we might end up with a mutiny on our hands. A massacre during every warp jump... As if we didn't have enough troubles to deal with on days like this." {n}He shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, el guardia tiene razón». {n}Abelard mira con el ceño fruncido a Marazhai.{/n} «Si esto sigue así, la tripulación terminará por amotinarse. Una masacre en cada salto a la disformidad... Como si no tuviésemos bastantes problemas últimamente». {n}El senescal menea la cabeza.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, subayın haklılık payı var." {n}Abelard, Marazhai'a ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Bu şekilde devam edersek gemide bir isyanla karşı karşıya kalabiliriz. Her öte sıçramada katliam yaşanması... Baş etmemiz gereken yeterince derdimiz yokmuş gibi." {n}Başını sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the officer has a point." {n}Abelard glowers at Marazhai.{/n} "If things continue on like this, we might end up with a mutiny on our hands. A massacre during every warp jump... As if we didn't have enough troubles to deal with on days like this." {n}He shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, subayın haklılık payı var." {n}Abelard, Marazhai'a ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Bu şekilde devam edersek gemide bir isyanla karşı karşıya kalabiliriz. Her öte sıçramada katliam gerçekleştirmek... Böyle günlerde baş etmemiz gereken yeterince derdimiz yokmuş gibi." {n}Başını sallıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
